ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 37
ygData.msgSnippet: Aradune is Brad s character....he and 2 other people are the three head programmers and basically came up with the entire game. Most class s have some weapon
ygData.messageBody:
Aradune is Brad's character....he and 2 other people are the three head
programmers and basically came up with the entire game.

Most class's have some weapon that only they can use. I haer there is an
SK only weapon....Fiery Avenger for paladins i guess, Druids have the
oaken scimitar...I hear tell of a ranger only weapon too. Warrior's
should be able to use any and all weapons, they are the MASTERS of melee.


A monk or any other class can't toast you if they can't hit you. Blind,
Fear, Root(which paladins get) plus many other spells like levitate or
whatnot.

Paladins can LAY ON HANDS.....that, from what i undestand, heals up to 500
HP.....500 HIT POINTS. Thats a good amount in my eyes.

I think Verant did a pretty good job balancing the class's. Not too
mention this game is not a PvP game...its meant for grouping and fun. I
think they balanced the class's against NPC's excelently....if you want
to PvP, go to a game that was meant for it or go play quake.
